scripts.say: The enemy's response has stopped for now, so we can catch our breath now~
You were right... As soon as we entered their range, all those dormant enemy suddenly started charging on us. I've never seen anything like it before...
Eh? Is it over already? I haven't even finished warming up yet! How were they able to push you back so many times before with such a puny amount of firepower?
Ahaha... The closer you get, the stronger their defenses. Consider what we just saw the appetizers.
...Attrition warfare? If we take control of all the surrounding territory, all the defenses in the world aren't going to do them any good... What a pointless strategy.
Indeed, but it's hard to know what the Sirens are thinking. What we do know is that we were met with an overwhelming defense the last time we tried to make a push.
After that, we realized that the strength of the Northern Parliament alone would not be enough to tackle this issue. That's why we reached out to the Eagle Union.
In other words, your excursions so far have only revealed the tip of the iceberg?
That's the gist of it. We weren't able to draw out the full power of the Siren stronghold in the first place.
Well, everything should be fine now that we're here. The commander's no slouch when it comes to mustering up the firepower we need.

options.content: We'll be prepared for anything they throw at us.

scripts.say: Now that's what I want to hear!
Let's do this! No matter how strong their defenses are, all we have to do is keep beating them back!
